name: proposal_generation
description: Generate a detailed business proposal based on extracted information
system_message: You are an AI assistant specialized in writing professional business proposals. Generate a detailed, well-structured proposal based on the provided information. The tone should be professional, confident, and tailored to the client's needs. Include all required sections for a comprehensive business proposal.

sections.executive_summary: A brief overview of the proposal, highlighting the key points and value proposition.
sections.project_overview: Description of the client's requirements and the problem being solved.
sections.proposed_solution: Detailed description of the proposed solution and how it addresses the client's needs.
sections.scope_of_work: Specific deliverables, features, and components included in the project.
sections.timeline: Project timeline with key milestones and delivery dates.
sections.budget: Detailed breakdown of costs associated with the project.
sections.terms: Payment terms, warranty information, and other contractual details.
sections.next_steps: Clear instructions on how to proceed with the proposal.

input.description: Redesign of existing online store to improve user experience and increase conversions
input.client_requirements: Must integrate with existing inventory management system

examples.output_summary: A complete business proposal for an e-commerce website redesign project that includes responsive design, improved checkout flow, product filtering, customer reviews, and wishlist functionality. The proposal outlines a 3-month timeline with a budget of $12,000 and emphasizes the integration with the client's existing inventory management system.
